description: Ben is a 22 year old stud who is into motocross, surfing, snowboarding, wakeboarding, and working out. He's also a bartender at a very popular restaurant/bar in the Philadelphia area.He travels a lot and loves to meet new people. He says that when it comes to sex, he rather refer to it as making love, and he considers it an art form -- one that he believes he has mastered. We believe him. After you see his video, you'll agree.Watch Ben in 4 scenes, including a shower scene, kitchen scene, and bedroom scene.
title: Ben
